name: T-Rocket
description: You play as a remote controlled rocket encased in an enclosure resembling that of a T-Rex. Put the T-Rocket through vigorous training missions to test its durability and flexibility. You will fly over, under, and through obstacles; either avoiding or destroying positioned enemy turrets. Blast through destructible walls, obtain keys to unlock gates, and pick up items to replenish fuel and missile ammunition. Successfully land the T-Rocket on the green landing pad to complete each level. As you progress through the levels, more obstacles are introduced; consequentially increasing the difficulty.
